TopicTitle: Closing up my account's mud content around here. For good.

Articles.Content: Due to heavy pressure from the community, I hereby shut down my mud content in my account here. For good.
But who shall now don the great soil crown and bring balance to everything dirty?

You changed your name. That's irreversible.

Your muddy fate was sealed from that, no use in trying to go back.
You're doomed to walk the halls of mud for all eternity. In addition to this, you must put lotion on the mud monster's back twice a day at 8 o'clock.

You're doomed to walk the halls of mud for all eternity. In addition to this, you must put lotion on the mud monster's back twice a day at 8 o'clock.

or else it gets the hose again.

You changed your name. That's irreversible.

Your muddy fate was sealed from that, no use in trying to go back.

wait, you can change your name?

wait, you can change your name?

Yes, but only once. Ask KasperVLD, he can probably get that done for you.

no, i love my username I just didn't know it could change.

The mud is like the Black Oil from the X-Files; it can change a person. And now it's searching for a new host.
